text: President Donald Trump has been on a rampage against public schools and colleges all week, threatening to use the power of the federal government to strong-arm officials into reopening classrooms https://t.co/Qm9Ww7rtND

text: President Trump plans to once again try to use protections for immigrants who came to the country illegally as children, known as Dreamers, to push Congress to pass a broader immigration deal https://t.co/L3Me9JndZG

name: politico
text:
